com.filesender.Cryptography

Class AES

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.filesender.Cryptography.AES

  • public class AES
extends java.lang.Object
    Class delivering all the methods necessary for using AES encryption. All the methods and fields are of static type. Before using, it is required to initialize class with method initialize().

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      private static javax.crypto.Cipher cipher
      Helper object necessary for the process of the encryption/decryption.
      static javax.crypto.SecretKey symmetricKey
      Symmetric key used for encryption/decryption.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      AES() 

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Static Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      static java.lang.Object decrypt(byte[] encryptedObject)
      Static method for AES decrypting an object that was previously encrypted by encrypt(Object).
      static byte[] encrypt(java.lang.Object object)
      Static method for AES encrypting any kind of an object of class inheriting after Object.
      static void generateCipher()
      Static method for generating new cipher.
      static void generateSymmetricKey()
      Static method for creating new symmetric key that will be saved as parameter 'symmetricKey' and used while encrypting/decrypting.
      static void initialize()
      Static method that should be called before any usage of AES class for encoding/decoding.

      • Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

        clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

    • Field Detail

      • cipher

        private static javax.crypto.Cipher cipher
        Helper object necessary for the process of the encryption/decryption. Initialized with method initialize() or generateCipher().
        See Also:
        initialize(), generateCipher()

      • symmetricKey

        public static javax.crypto.SecretKey symmetricKey
        Symmetric key used for encryption/decryption. Is generated automatically when initialize(). Initialized with method initialize() or generateSymmetricKey().
        See Also:
        initialize(), generateSymmetricKey()

    • Constructor Detail

      • AES

        public AES()

    • Method Detail

      • initialize

        public static void initialize()
        Static method that should be called before any usage of AES class for encoding/decoding. Method generates the 'cipher' and 'symmetricKey' properties values for internal usage.

      • generateSymmetricKey

        public static void generateSymmetricKey()
        Static method for creating new symmetric key that will be saved as parameter 'symmetricKey' and used while encrypting/decrypting. Is called by initialize().
        See Also:
        symmetricKey, initialize()

      • generateCipher

        public static void generateCipher()
        Static method for generating new cipher. It is required at least once before using encryption/decryption. It is called by initialize().
        See Also:
        initialize()

      • encrypt

        public static byte[] encrypt(java.lang.Object object)
        Static method for AES encrypting any kind of an object of class inheriting after Object.
        Parameters:
        object - Object that is meant to be encrypted. Can be of any class inheriting after the Object.
        Returns:
        Encrypted object in a form of byte[]. Can be read after decryption
        See Also:
        decrypt(byte[])

      • decrypt

        public static java.lang.Object decrypt(byte[] encryptedObject)
        Static method for AES decrypting an object that was previously encrypted by encrypt(Object).
        Parameters:
        encryptedObject - Object that is meant to be decrypted. Must have been previously encrypted with encrypt(Object).
        Returns:
        Object of type Object. Must be casted to the proper class.
        See Also:
        encrypt(Object)
